sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import jsSHA from 'jssha'; class Beneficiary extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state ={ acc: '', name: '', bank: '', accNum: '', accType: '', benRef: '', ownRef: '', email: '', address: '', payAmt1: '', payAmt2: '', payAmt3: '', myRef1: '', myRef2: '', myRef3: '', theirRef1: '', theirRef2: '', theirRef3: '', } this.onChangeAcc = this.onChangeAcc.bind(this) this.onChangeBank = this.onChangeBank.bind(this) } componentDidMount() { const user = 'ticklishswan772' //this.props.username const password = 'coltrane' //this.props.password const hmac = new jsSHA('SHA-256', 'TEXT'); hmac.setHMACKey(password, 'TEXT'); hmac.update(user); hmac.update(Date.now().toString(36).substring(0, 4)); const token = `${hmac.getHMAC('HEX')}%${user}`; const api = axios.create({ baseURL: 'http://45.77.58.134:8080', headers: { 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + token } }); (async () => { const res = await api.get('/clients'); const acc = await api.get(`/accounts/${res.data[0]._id}`) let trans = await api.get(`/transactions/${acc.data[0]._id}/.*`) await api.post("/transactions", { "type": this.state.type, "src": acc.data[0]._id, "dest": acc.data[0]._id, "amount": this.state.amount, "ref": this.state.ref, }); trans = await api.get(`/transactions/${acc.data[0]._id}/.*`) console.log(trans); })(); } onChangeAcc(event) { this.setState ({ acc: event.target.value }) } onChangeBank(event) { this.setState ({ bank: event.target.value }) } onChangeAccType(event) { this.setState ({ accType: event.target.value }) } render () { return (
Once-off Payments Scheduled Payments Pay Beneficiaries Payment History

1. Choose Default Payment Account

2. Beneficiary Details

Beneficiary Name: {this.setState({name: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.name} />

Select Bank:

Account Number: {this.setState({accNum: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.accNum} />

Account Type:

Beneficiary Reference: {this.setState({benRef: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.benRef} />

Own Reference: {this.setState({ownRef: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.ownRef} />

3. Proof of Payment

Email Address: {this.setState({email: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.email} />

Addressed To: {this.setState({address: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.address} />

Please note

Your payment may take up to 24 hours to reflect on Bank of the Sun accounts, and up to 2 business days with other banks.

console.log(this.state)} value="Add"/> console.log(this.state)} value="Cancel"/>

Daniel Simpson {this.setState({payAmt1: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.payAmt1} /> New Recipient 250.00 {this.setState({myRef1: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.myRef1} /> {this.setState({theirRef1: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.theirRef1} />
Jade Johnson {this.setState({payAmt2: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.payAmt2} /> 1 July 2018 950.00 {this.setState({myRef2: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.myRef2} /> {this.setState({theirRef2: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.theirRef2} />
Megan Pastor {this.setState({payAmt3: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.payAmt3} /> 16 April 2018 540.50 {this.setState({myRef3: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.myRef3} /> {this.setState({theirRef3: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.theirRef3} />
console.log(this.state)} value="Pay"/> console.log(this.state)} value="Cancel"/>
) } } export default Beneficiary
